About Us


Brief description about the journey of RSE Asia Association.




The RSE Asia Association was launched during a project under the Open Life Science Cohort-4 programme (OLS-4) programme by Saranjeet Kaur Bhogal and Jyoti Bhogal, under the Mentorship of Anne Fouilloux. It was launched on Thursday, 14th October 2021, which is also the first International RSE Day. At the launch event we conducted activities for contributing to Hacktoberfest 2021. Both Saranjeet and Jyoti graduated from the OLS-4 during early 2022 (graduation certificates below).





Furthermore, under the Pilot Mentoring Programme of the Society of Research Software Engineering, Saranjeet is working on the building community around the RSE Asia Association, mentored by Michelle Barker.

articles.title: RSE Asia Association
Membership
articles.description: To become a community member of the RSE Asia Association, please fill this short [membership form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSci4FOE7wBeDJQowDSmweujLhJFfzr2rut46yKJc0agkE7Jug/viewform). The community membership of the RSE Asia Association is free and open to all. People from all regions of the globe are welcome to join our community, irrespective of whether they belong to or are located in Asia.

Membership


To become a community member of the RSE Asia Association, please fill this short membership form. The community membership of the RSE Asia Association is free and open to all. People from all regions of the globe are welcome to join our community, irrespective of whether they belong to or are located in Asia.
